import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./dashboard.css" import axios from "axios" import "./admin.css"; class Dashboard extends Component { constructor(){ super() this.state={ habitant:[], search:"" } this.searchChange= this.searchChange.bind(this) } searchChange(e){ this.setState({search:e.target.value}) } componentDidMount(){ axios.get("http://localhost:8080/user").then(user=>{ console.log(user.data) this.setState({habitant:user.data}) }) } render(){ return(
